mapper.insert: insert into t_product(product_name, product_models, product_link, price, product_desc, second_id, guide_id, video_id, product_reserve1, product_reserve2, product_reserve3, product_reserve4, product_reserve5) values (#{productName},#{productModels},#{productLink},#{price},#{productDesc},#{secondId},#{guideId},#{videoId},#{productReserve1},#{productReserve2},#{productReserve3},#{productReserve4},#{productReserve5})
mapper.select: SELECT product.product_name,product.product_id,product.product_models,product.price,product.product_link,product.product_desc,product.product_reserve1,product.product_reserve2,product.product_reserve3,product.product_reserve4,product.product_reserve5, sec.second_name,sec.second_id,sec.second_desc, pp.id, pp.product_id,pp.value_id, property.property_name,property.property_id,property.property_desc, val.value_name,val.value_id, picture.picture_id, picture.picture_name, picture.picture_link, picture.picture_add_time, picture.picture_reserve,picture.default_picture, video.video_id, video.video_name, video.video_link, video.video_add_time, video.video_desc, video.video_reserve, guide.guide_id, guide.guide_name, guide.guide_link, guide.guide_add_time, guide.guide_desc, guide.guide_reserve FROM t_product product left join t_product_property pp on pp.product_id=product.product_id left join t_property_value val on val.value_id=pp.value_id left join t_property property on property.property_id=val.property_id left join t_secondlevel sec on sec.second_id=product.second_id left join t_guide guide on guide.guide_id=product.guide_id left join t_video video on video.video_id=product.video_id left join t_picture picture on picture.product_id=product.product_id

SELECT product.product_name,product.product_id,product.product_models,product.price,product.product_link,product.product_desc,product.product_reserve1,product.product_reserve2,product.product_reserve3,product.product_reserve4,product.product_reserve5, sec.second_name,sec.second_id,sec.second_desc, pp.id, pp.product_id,pp.value_id, property.property_name,property.property_id,property.property_desc, val.value_name,val.value_id, picture.picture_id, picture.picture_name, picture.picture_link, picture.picture_add_time, picture.picture_reserve,picture.default_picture, video.video_id, video.video_name, video.video_link, video.video_add_time, video.video_desc, video.video_reserve, guide.guide_id, guide.guide_name, guide.guide_link, guide.guide_add_time, guide.guide_desc, guide.guide_reserve FROM t_product product left join t_product_property pp on pp.product_id=product.product_id left join t_property_value val on val.value_id=pp.value_id left join t_property property on property.property_id=val.property_id left join t_secondlevel sec on sec.second_id=product.second_id left join t_guide guide on guide.guide_id=product.guide_id left join t_video video on video.video_id=product.video_id left join t_picture picture on picture.product_id=product.product_id where product.product_id in(SELECT product1.product_id from(SELECT product2.product_id from t_product as product2 limit #{offset},#{size})as product1) and product.second_id=#{secondId}
